verses.verse: The <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5045>South,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> tell that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H871>Atharim;<s%> and he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7617>took<s%> some of them <S%H7628>captive.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "If you will <S%H5414>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> then I will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and delivered <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> and they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them and their <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> to <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom:<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> was much <S%H7114>discouraged<s%> because of the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H430>God,<s%> and against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Why have you brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> For there is no <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and there is no <S%H4325>water;<s%> and our <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6973>loathes<s%> this <S%H7052>light<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents<s%> among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H5391>bit<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> because we have <S%H559>spoken<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and against <S%H6419>you.<s%> Pray to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5175>serpents<s%> from <S%H4872>us.<s%>" Moses <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6213>"Make<s%> a fiery <S%H8314>serpent,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it on a <S%H5251>standard:<s%> and it shall <S%H5391>happen,<s%> that everyone who is bitten, when he sees <S%H7200>it,<s%> shall live."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it on the <S%H5251>standard:<s%> and it <S%H5175>happened,<s%> that if a serpent had <S%H5391>bitten<s%> any <S%H376>man,<s%> when he <S%H5027>looked<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> he <S%H2425>lived.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H5863>Iyeabarim,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> toward the sunrise.
From there they <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H2218>Zered.<s%>

From there they <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> which is in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that comes <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites:<s%> for the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> between <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

Therefore it is <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4421>Wars<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2052>"Vaheb<s%> in <S%H5492>Suphah,<s%> the <S%H5158>valleys<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%>
the <S%H793>slope<s%> of the <S%H5158>valleys<s%> that <S%H5186>incline<s%> toward the <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> of <S%H6144>Ar,<s%> <S%H8172>leans<s%> on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>"

From there they traveled to <S%H876>Beer:<s%> that is the <S%H875>well<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H622>"Gather<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4325>water.<s%>"
Then <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H7892>song:<s%> "Spring <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H875>well;<s%> sing to <S%H6030>it:<s%>

the <S%H875>well,<s%> which the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H2658>dug,<s%> which the <S%H5081>nobles<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3738>dug,<s%> with the <S%H2710>scepter,<s%> and with their <S%H4938>poles.<s%>" From the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they traveled to <S%H4980>Mattanah;<s%>
and from <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%> to <S%H5160>Nahaliel;<s%> and from <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%> to <S%H1120>Bamoth;<s%>

and from <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> which <S%H8259>looks<s%> <S%H6440>down<s%> on the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land:<s%> we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> aside into <S%H7704>field,<s%> or into <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> we will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H875>wells:<s%> we will <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1870>highway,<s%> until we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> your <S%H1366>border.<s%>"

<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> would not <S%H5414>allow<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>border:<s%> but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3096>Jahaz;<s%> and he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> to the <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%> for the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> was <S%H5794>strong.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all these <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and in all its <S%H1323>towns.<s%>

For <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> was the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H3947>taken<s%> all his <S%H776>land<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even to the <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

Therefore those who speak in <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> to <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%> Let the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%> and <S%H3559>established;<s%>

for a <S%H784>fire<s%> has gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> a <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon.<s%> It has <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> The lords of the high <S%H1181>places<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H4124>you,<s%> Moab! You are <S%H6>undone,<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh!<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> as <S%H6412>fugitives,<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> into <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

We have <S%H3384>shot<s%> at <S%H2809>them.<s%> Heshbon has <S%H6>perished<s%> even to <S%H1769>Dibon.<s%> We have laid <S%H8074>waste<s%> even to <S%H5302>Nophah,<s%> Which reaches to <S%H4311>Medeba.<s%>"
Thus <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H3270>Jazer;<s%> and they <S%H3920>took<s%> its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and drove <S%H3423>out<s%> the Amorites who were <S%H567>there.<s%>

They <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan:<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H5971>them,<s%> he and all his people, to <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> fear <S%H5414>him:<s%> for I have delivered him into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and all his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and his <S%H776>land;<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>"

So they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H1121>him,<s%> and his sons and all his <S%H5971>people,<s%> until there was <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H8300>remaining:<s%> and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land.<s%>
